Package edu.ncsu.csc216.packdoption.model.rescue

Class Rescue

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.packdoption.model.rescue.Rescue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Rescue>
    public class Rescue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Rescue>
    This class represents a an animal Rescue that will contain many animals and vetrinarian appointments for those animals
    Author:
    John Widdifield

      • setAdoptionInfo

        public void setAdoptionInfo​(Animal animal,
                            boolean isAdopted,
                            Date dateAdopted,
                            java.lang.String owner)
        Sets adoption information for animal if animal is in the rescue. Does nothing if animal is not in the rescue
        Parameters:
        animal - Animal you would like to set the adoption info for
        isAdopted - isAdopted boolean value to set for the animal, true if adopted false if not
        dateAdopted - Date the animal was adopted
        owner - Owners name as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if animal is null. See Animal.setAdoptionInfo() for other cases when IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

      • availableAnimalsDayRange

        public SortedLinkedList<Animal> availableAnimalsDayRange​(Date today,
                                                         int min,
                                                         int max)
        Gets all of the animals in the rescue that are available and have been available between the min and max days (inclusive)
        Parameters:
        today - Todays Date
        min - minimum days the animal has been available to search for
        max - maximum days the animal has been available to search for
        Returns:
        SortedLinkedList of all animals in the rescue that are available for adoption and have been available between the min and max days
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if (1) today is null, (2) today is before one of the animal’s dateEnterRescue, (3) max is less than min, or (4) min is less than zero

      • availableAnimalsAge

        public SortedLinkedList<Animal> availableAnimalsAge​(Date today,
                                                    int min,
                                                    int max)
        Gets a SortedLinkedList of all animals in rescue that are available for adoption (have not been adopted) and are between min and max years old (inclusive)
        Parameters:
        today - Todays date
        min - Minimum age that the animal must be to be in the list
        max - Maximum age that the animal must be to be in the list
        Returns:
        a SortedLinkedList of the animals in the rescue that are between the min and max years old (inclusive)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if (1) today is null, (2) today is before one of the animal’s birthday, (3) max is less than min, or (4) min is less than zero.

      • getAnimalsAsArray

        public java.lang.String[][] getAnimalsAsArray​(Date today)
        Gets the animals in the rescue as an array
        Parameters:
        today - Today's Date
        Returns:
        a 2D array of string representing all animals in rescue. First dimension is the animal (in sorted order). Second dimension are the different elements: Name, Type (Dog or Cat), Birthday, Age, Age Category, Adopted (Yes or No), Days in Rescue (if adopted then empty string). If the list is empty, an empty 2D array is returned.

      • getAppointmentsAsArray

        public java.lang.String[][] getAppointmentsAsArray​(Date today)
        Gets the animal appointments in the rescue as a 2D array
        Parameters:
        today - Today's Date
        Returns:
        a 2D array of string representing all animals in rescue. First dimension is the animal (in sorted order). Second dimension are the different elements: Name, Type (Dog or Cat), Birthday, Age, Age Category, Adopted (Yes or No), Days in Rescue (if adopted then empty string). If the list is empty, an empty 2D array is returned.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
